channel.title: 5. Deploy on ion
channel.description: Recent content in 5. Deploy on ion

item.title: 1. Deploy with caddy
item.description: 1. Prepare a server Tips: you should make sure: All the ports that ion needed is open on your server firewall All the ports that ion needed is mapped to your server if it’s behind a NAT(This is not needed if your server has a External Internet IP) You can config them in your cloud server provider console 2. Make sure all the module installed Tips: see the “quickstart” section
